sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO tm_svrqxm ( serv_id, corp_code, rqst_type, serv_title, serv_cont, file_id, appl_user, proc_status, rqst_user, dele_yn,
rqfn_date,
cr_date, md_date ) select (select COALESCE(max(serv_id), 0) + 1 from tm_svrqxm) serv_id, #corpCode#, #rqstType#, #servTitle#, #servCont#, #fileId#, (SELECT A.user_code FROM tm_userxm A, (SELECT * FROM tm_userxm WHERE user_code = #rqstUser#) B WHERE A.corp_code = B.corp_code AND A.dept_code = B.dept_code AND A.ofce_code = '40' AND A.use_yn = 'Y' AND A.dele_yn != 'Y' LIMIT 1), #procStatus#, #rqstUser#, 'N',
to_date(#rqfnDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),
NOW(), NOW()

INSERT INTO tm_svpcxm ( serv_id, proc_seq, proc_status, proc_user, proc_cont, proc_date ) select
to_number(#servId#, '9999999999999'), (select COALESCE(max(proc_seq), 0) + 1 from tm_svpcxm where serv_id = to_number(#servId#, '9999999999999')) proc_seq,
(select max(serv_id) from tm_svrqxm) serv_id, 1,
#procStatus#, #procUser#, #procCont#, NOW()
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE tm_svrqxm SET corp_code = #corpCode#, rqst_type = #rqstType#, serv_title = #servTitle#, serv_cont = #servCont#, file_id = #fileId#,
rqfn_date = to_date(#rqfnDate#,'YYYY-MM-DD'),
md_date = NOW() WHERE serv_id=to_number(#servId#, '9999999999999')
UPDATE tm_svrqxm SET dele_yn = 'Y' , md_date=NOW() WHERE serv_id=to_number(#servId#, '9999999999999')
UPDATE tm_svrqxm SET proc_status = #procStatus# , md_date=NOW() WHERE serv_id=to_number(#servId#, '9999999999999')
sqlMap.sql:
FROM tm_svrqxm A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A2.* FROM tm_svpcxm A2, (SELECT serv_id, MAX(proc_seq) proc_seq FROM tm_svpcxm GROUP BY serv_id) B2 WHERE A2.serv_id = B2.serv_id AND A2.proc_seq = B2.proc_seq ) B ON A.serv_id = B.serv_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tm_userxm C on C.user_code = B.proc_user LEFT OUTER JOIN ( select serv_id, max(proc_date) proc_date from tm_svpcxm where proc_status = 'APPROVAL' GROUP BY serv_id ) D ON A.serv_id = D.serv_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tm_userxm E on E.user_code = A.rqst_user WHERE A.dele_yn = 'N'
and A.corp_code = #corpCode#
and A.rqst_user = #rqstUser#
and B.proc_user = #procUser#
and to_char(D.proc_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #strtDate#
and to_char(D.proc_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= #lastDate#
and COALESCE(B.proc_status, 'SAVE') not in ('SAVE')
and COALESCE(B.proc_status, 'SAVE') in ('RECIPT', 'PROCESS')
and a.serv_title like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
and a.serv_cont like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
and E.user_name like '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.serv_id, A.corp_code, A.rqst_type, A.serv_title, A.serv_cont, A.file_id, A.rqfn_date, A.appl_user, A.rqst_user, A.cr_date, A.md_date, A.dele_yn, B.proc_seq, B.proc_status, B.proc_user, B.proc_cont, to_char(B.proc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') proc_date, CASE WHEN B.proc_status = 'FINISH' THEN to_char(B.proc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END finish_date, CASE WHEN B.proc_status = 'SAVE' THEN '저장' WHEN B.proc_status = 'APPROVAL' THEN '결재대기' WHEN B.proc_status = 'RECIPT' THEN '접수대기' WHEN B.proc_status = 'PROCESS' THEN '처리중' WHEN B.proc_status = 'FINISH' THEN '완료' WHEN B.proc_status = 'RETURN' THEN '반려' WHEN B.proc_status = 'REAPPROVAL' THEN '재상신' END AS proc_status_name, C.user_name proc_user_name, to_char(D.proc_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') cr_date2, E.user_name rqust_user_name
ORDER BY A.serv_id desc
